docs.text: Welcome! Here you can find information on how I stream, create videos and more.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Here you can find information on how I stream, create videos and more.
docs.title: Welcome!

docs.text: Software I use the latest stable release of Davinci Resolve Studio by Blackmagic Design. The regular (free) version is also sufficient for most (~95%) of the things I do with the software.
docs.title: Software

docs.text: I use the latest stable release of Davinci Resolve Studio by Blackmagic Design. The regular (free) version is also sufficient for most (~95%) of the things I do with the software.
docs.title: Software

docs.text: Mods I use BS+ with the Chat integration when streaming Beat Saber. This is what displays the Twitch chat in game, but it also has many other features. As of writing this, the latest version of BS+ can be downloaded from here: https://github.com/hardcpp/BeatSaberPlus/releases
docs.title: Mods
